    kremboxer.greybody_utils.GB_lambda(lams, T, emissivity=1)

    Compute the greybody radiation emitted by an object at temperature T

    Parameters¶
    lams¶

    wavelengths at which to compute the radiance

    T¶

    temperature of the object

    emissivity=1¶

    emissivity of the object, defaults to 1

    Returns¶

    array of radiances of the greybody at the given wavelengths
